m_szDocSumamry: News:PESN:Archive News archive of http://pesn.com news articles posted here at at PESWiki.com. 2016 Featured / Top 5 : Magnet Motors > U-Plug > Blog: March 26 Test > U-Plug Products LLC Seeking Good Third-Party Testing Entity - It's not easy to find a qualified testing agency that is also willing to sign off on something that appears to defy our existing understanding of the laws of physics. U-Plug has agreed to allow for a group of us scientists, including at least 3 PhDs to go test their unit and publish our report. (PESN; February 20, 2016) Featured / Top 5 / For Sale : Earthâ€™s Mag.
